name: Thistle Birmingham City Centre, The Royal Angus

reviews.text: There's little to cheer about but also little to moan about with this typical city centre chain hotel. Fistly, if you're coming by road, it's not well signposted and is easy to miss - even with sat.nav. Coming in on the A38 keep going further than the website indicates towards the city centre - look for the Dental Hospital on the left and the hotel is immediately adjacent- apparently built as an after- thought under a large NCP carpark, which provides the hotel parking. It's on a one-way system, so miss it and you have a hefty detour to get back.
reviews.title: Bland, boring Brum

description: At Thistle Birmingham City, our city-centre location makes us an ideal venue for both business and leisure travellers. We’re close to the Bullring shopping centre, and within 10 minutes’ drive to the City Stadium, Villa Park and Edgbaston.
